13.m: And he awoke and rebuked the wind and said to the sea, “Peace! Be still!” And the wind ceased, and there was a great calm. - Mark 4:39 (ESV)

l.q: What happened while Jesus and his disciples were in the boat?
l.a: While Jesus and his disciples were in the boat, there was a great windstorm.

l.q: What were the disciples' reaction when they saw Jesus sleeping in the stern?
l.a: The disciples were very much afraid that they will die. But Jesus doesn't look afraid, on the contrary, he can still afford to sleep.

l.q: What did the disciples realize when they witnessed how Jesus commanded the wind and the sea?
l.a: The disciples realized that Jesus has power over the forces of nature, and nature obey Jesus. Only God has this power.

13.p: Thank you, Lord Jesus, that I can come to you whenever I feel overwhelmed. Even in times of natural calamities, you are in control. Peace and calm come from you and you can quiet my heart knowing that I can always trust in your love.
